issue.title: [R][CI] Nightly builds not happening (or artifacts not exported)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11202](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11202). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The instructions to install a nightly build (here: https://arrow.apache.org/docs/r/#installing-a-development-version) lead to a version `2.0.0.20201222`, that does not appear to be a nightly build (in particular changes from 20201230 are missing).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11202?focusedCommentId=17262752) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Thanks. GitHub "helpfully" disabled the scheduled jobs due to inactivity for 60 days. I just re-enabled them.
